short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool that syncs your university transcripts with Skillco.net

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When the user presses sync, a new tab will pop up and get transcript data from userve.uvu.edu and visit skillco.net to submit the data where it can be allocated into a skillset.
